title: Pset_FireSuppressionTerminalTypeFireHydrant
description:
Device, fitted to a pipe, through which a temporary supply of water may be provided (BS6100 330 6107)

For further details on fire hydrants, see www.firehydrant.org

FireHydrantType.title: FireHydrantType
FireHydrantType.description:
Defines the range of hydrant types from which the required type can be selected where.

DryBarrel:	 A hydrant that has isolating valves fitted below ground and that may be used where the possibility of water freezing is a consideration.
WetBarrel:	 A hydrant that has isolating valves fitted above ground and that may be used where there is no possibility of water freezing.

PumperConnectionSize.title: PumperConnectionSize
PumperConnectionSize.description: The size of a connection to which a fire hose may be connected that is then linked to a pumping unit.

NumberOfHoseConnections.title: NumberOfHoseConnections
NumberOfHoseConnections.description: The number of hose connections on the hydrant (excluding the pumper connection).

HoseConnectionSize.title: HoseConnectionSize
HoseConnectionSize.description: The size of connections to which a hose may be connected (other than that to be linked to a pumping unit).

DischargeFlowRate.title: DischargeFlowRate
DischargeFlowRate.description: The volumetric rate of fluid discharge.

FlowClass.title: FlowClass
FlowClass.description: Alphanumeric indication of the flow class of a hydrant (may be used in connection with or instead of the FlowRate property).

WaterIsPotable.title: WaterIsPotable
WaterIsPotable.description: Indication of whether the water flow from the hydrant is potable (set TRUE) or non potable (set FALSE).

PressureRating.title: PressureRating
PressureRating.description: Maximum pressure that the hydrant is manufactured to withstand.

BodyColor.title: BodyColor
BodyColor.description:
Color of the body of the hydrant.

Note: Consult local fire regulations for statutory colors that may be required for hydrant bodies in particular circumstances.

CapColor.title: CapColor
CapColor.description:
Color of the caps of the hydrant.

Note: Consult local fire regulations for statutory colors that may be required for hydrant caps in particular circumstances.
